extension.name: VM Modcontroller Pro
extension.author: Fiona Coulter
extension.description: Controls the display of modules on Virtuemart pages. Compatible with Virtuemart 2 and 3, and Joomla 2.5 and 3

field.name: renderMod
field.label: Choose Module
field.description: Choose the module that you wish to display

field.name: vmcat
field.label: VM Categories
field.description: Choose the Virtuemart categories for which the module will be rendered. Use control-click to select more than one. LEAVE BLANK UNLESS YOU NEED TO FILTER BY CATEGORIES.

field.name: vmcat_exclude
field.label: VM Categories to exclude
field.description: Choose the Virtuemart categories for which the module will NOT be rendered. Use control-click to select more than one. LEAVE BLANK UNLESS YOU NEED TO FILTER BY CATEGORIES.

field.name: vmmanufacturer
field.label: VM Manufacturers
field.description: Choose the Virtuemart manufacturers for which the module will be rendered. Use control-click to select more than one. LEAVE BLANK UNLESS YOU NEED TO FILTER BY manufacturers.

field.name: vmmanufacturer_exclude
field.label: VM Manufacturers to Exclude
field.description: Choose the Virtuemart manufacturers for which the module will NOT be rendered. Use control-click to select more than one. LEAVE BLANK UNLESS YOU NEED TO FILTER BY manufacturers.

field.name: vmpage
field.label: VM Page
field.description: Choose the Virtuemart pages to display the module. Use control-click to select more than one. The default is to show all pages. LEAVE BLANK UNLESS YOU ONLY WANT TO DISLAY ON SPECIFIC PAGES

field.name: vmpage_exclude
field.label: VM Pages to Exclude
field.description: Choose the Virtuemart pages to exclude display of the module. Use control-click to select more than one. The default is to show on all pages. LEAVE BLANK UNLESS YOU NEED TO EXCLUDE SPECIFIC PAGES

field.name: vmusertype
field.label: User Type
field.description: User type: visitor or registered shopper

field.name: vmshoppergroup
field.label: shopper group
field.description: Virtuemart shopper group: use control click to select more than one. LEAVE BLANK UNLESS YOU NEED TO FILTER BY SHOPPER GROUP.

field.name: sslpages
field.label: SSL Pages
field.description: Select this parameter if you want to filter by http:/https: protocol. Otherwise leave blank

field.name: nonvmpages
field.label: Non-Virtuemart Pages
field.description: Select this parameter if you want to filter by whether or not module is on a Virtuemart page. Otherwise leave blank

field.name: cache
field.label: Caching
field.description: Select whether to cache the content of this module

field.name: cache_time
field.label: Cache Time
field.description: The time before the module is recached
